channel.title: Airpods & Airballs
channel.itunes:summary: Airpods & Airballs is a hot take basketball podcast with tons of off-topic banter, Warriors talk, and Luke Walton slander

item.title: Anthony Davis Trade Evaluation! Did the Lakers give up too much? Also, Warriors 2019 Finals postmortem.
item.description: The Lakers gave up way too much for AD? Will the Warriors recover form the devastating 2019 finals? Did Dom put out bad karma and curse the Lakers? Will Brad and Dom ever speak again? Joe(@needswg) and @DomJaranilla cover all this and more this week
item.itunes:author: Hoopin and scoopin
item.itunes:subtitle: The Lakers gave up way too much for AD? Will the Warriors recover form the devastating 2019 finals? Did Dom put out bad karma and curse the Lakers? Will Brad and Dom ever speak again? Joe(@needswg) and @DomJaranilla cover all this and more this week

item.googleplay:description: The Lakers gave up way too much for AD? Will the Warriors recover form the devastating 2019 finals? Did Dom put out bad karma and curse the Lakers? Will Brad and Dom ever speak again? Joe(@needswg) and @DomJaranilla cover all this and more this week

item.title: 11. The Warriors win an emotional Game 5! Plus, the devastating KD injury and what that means for the future.
item.description: Dom and Brad are joined by guests, the reoccurring Geoff Kim, and newcomer, Mark Chen to discuss the emotional win in Game 5. We discuss whether the Warriors have enough in the tank to win this series and of course, the devastating Kevin Durant injury. + as always, Haters Corner.
item.itunes:author: Hoopin and scoopin

item.title: 10. Raptors thrash the battered Warriors in Game 3! Is help on the way? Time to panic?
item.description: Dom and Brad share their thoughts on the Raptors win over the shorthanded Warriors in Game 3. We look ahead to a critical Game 4 and what to expect for the remainder of the series. + a Rec League Recap and America's favorite corner: Haters Corner.

item.title: 2019 NBA Finals Preview! Plus, can the Lakers get any more dysfunctional? w/ many guests!
item.description: We talk about the 2019 NBA Finals, plus the latest ESPN news on the Lakers! Also, we take calls from Vitto (@VeetyVitz), Kev (@kcposports), and Jojo (@djongo_). And of course we have your usual favorites (Hater's Corner, Rec League Recap) Follow us on twitter @needswg @BradNewsBears92 @DomJaranilla

item.title: Would the Lakers have won more games in the WCF than Portland?!?! What does this all mean without KD??? w/ not so special guest Geoff
item.description: We recap the BORING WCF, and how the team is looking without KD. Also, Dom comes in HOT about the Lakers. Plus a lively hater's corner, and some rec league recap! Follow us on twitter @needswg @BradNewsBears92 @DomJaranilla @ThatHalfKorean

item.title: The Warriors got this in the bag right? Who's coming out of the East? The Lakers drama free (for once) + special guest Geoff
item.description: This week, we talk about the recent updates int he Warriors Clippers series, and preview game 5. Also, some lively debate about the Eastern conference playoffs. Also, rec league recap, baseball talk, and HATER'S CORNER IS BACK! Follow us on twitter @needswg @BradNewsBears92 @DomJaranilla @ThatHalfKorean

item.title: WCF Game 1 recap and the Warriors beat the Rockets! Straight to the finals right? Also, are the Lakers actually a functional team?
item.description: Wow, what a playoffs so far. We talk about the rest of ht NBA playoffs, the Warriors without KD, And the whole Lakers coaching situation. Plus hater's corner, rec league recap, and our first mailbag!

item.title: Are the Warriors in trouble? Magic left the Lakers, now what? Plus a special guest!
item.description: We do an in-depth recap of the Warriors Game 2 implosion. Plus we talk about Magic Johnson, the rest of the NBA playoffs. Also, a baseball recap, some rec league highlights, and a brand new recurring segment. Follow us on Twitter: @needswg @BradNewsBears92 @Dom_Jaranilla

item.title: Episode 1 - WE ARE BACK + Post Trade Deadline Analysis & More!
item.description: Posted way late... lol The boys are back! We're doing hot takes, the trade deadline, and should Luke Walton be fired (we talked about it before it was cool)
